reviewText: I found this very interesting. Have Rod Roddenberry research his father's legacy was very informative.

I thought that Gene's son gave a great factual look at his dad and the life that he lived.  I also thought that this was probably a therapeutic journey for him to discover who his father really was and the impact his father had on the world.  If you want to discover Gene Roddenberry thru the eyes of his son, this movie is for you.
